The photograph shared on Facebook shows: 2. The reverse image search reveals that the yellow van in the photo belongs to Austrian roadside assistance association OAMTC, which uses it to charge electric vehicles that run out of battery on the road.
The OAMTC posted the original photo on M: 2019, showcasing their "Mobile Power Bank" for e-cars, which successfully completed its first test in practice.
Expert statements from Alexander Lueger: an OAMTC member, and Stuart Davies, founder of the lithium battery producer votexa, confirm that the yellow van in the photo is not powered by a petrol generator but by lithium battery packs that can provide electricity for an electric vehicle for about 12 kilometers.
